categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Albus Marinith was an Imperial officer who served as Flag Captain of the Imperial I-class Star Destroyer Chimaera, the flagship of Grand Admiral Thrawn. An old and reliable Imperial Navy officer, Marinith was handpicked by Thrawn himself, becoming a close colleague. Marinith, along with other officers of the Galactic Empire's Seventh Fleet, described Thrawn as cool and analytical, and appreciated his passion of art and tactics.
Albus Marinith was first mentioned in Dawn of Rebellion, a roleplaying supplement that was released in 2018 and published by Fantasy Flight Games.
